Dear Sal,
Your efforts have been pivotal in making basic education free and more accessible to everyone.
I'm so grateful to Khan Academy
for revolutionising the educational world.
My endless gratitude for you.
Thank you for putting in so much of efforts in all these years.
You have been nothing less than a blessing for all of us.
You have been an inspiration for me.
I'll never forget what all you have done for us.
I'll cherish your kindness and generosity and your good deeds.
As you always keep saying,
"Learning never stops"...
These are such inspiring words that it has completely changed my life and my perceptions.
I will live by it,
I hope to carry forward your legacy.
I will help people to learn in any and in every possible way; in all of my capacity.
I would keep encouraging more and more people to join Khan Academy.
I can't really thank you enough for all that you have been doing for the greater good of the society.
Much Appreciation for you.🙏
